\>ma'am (used by geisha to refer to their superiors)
You always look so scary, you don't get any customers at all.
I like it better when it's empty, though.
Why did you come into the counter?
I'm in a bit of trouble: ......
You want to help me with something?
That, too, is a bit of a problem.
They don't have aprons for girls.
You're wearing such beautiful clothes, you'd better not get them dirty.
Come back when you find a good one.
They don't have aprons for girls.
Come back when you find a good one.
Just for summer vacation, I'll pay for your part-time job, help me out: ......
I was just helping out a little bit, okay?
Tanaoro is very strict about labor regulations. ......
If we don't pay him properly, we won't be able to run the store...
All right!　Well, thank you very much!
If you talk to me again.
If you need me... I'll ask for you. ......
Yeah!　If it's okay with you.
It would be nice if you could change your clothes...
Master!　What can I do for you?
If you talk to me again.
If you need me... I'll ask for you. ......
Yes, thank you for your help!
Mr. Arle, I have a part-time job...
Master!　What can I do for you?
Is this what it looks like?
Curry is the only thing I can make without fail.
Master, you can try it later if you like.
You mean Mr. Kerr?　Yeah, I was thinking...
Damn it!　You don't understand me at all!
We can make another one, so...
Please deduct the cost of materials from your part-time job.
Can you still make it today?
I won't deduct your part-time pay.
Can you run an errand for me?
Arul's particular spices, I hope you can collect them...
Here's your part-time job money and your errand money.
Oh, no, no, no. I'll pay for it.
If you do that, you'll never make it in this town...
Besides, it's not your fault, Arle.
Mr. Arle, I have a part-time job...
Thank you. You've been a big help.
Master, I'll be watching you better this time.
When should I make the curry?
In a cool place, it'll last two days...
This customer wanted to try Arul's curry.
He said he was postponing his departure...
We did it!　That was a huge success!
Thank you for your help. This is my part-time job...
When you get busy again, please...
Yes!　If it's okay with you.
I know it's a lot to ask, but please...
Hey, girl, it's not just magic.
You'll leave some for me, right?　Hey, big guy!
Heh, I made it, or rather...
I just served it just like the master told me to.
I'm glad it turned out better than I expected.
The kitchen, it's yours to use. Just...
I'll bring you some from the farm next door, which was recently established...
You can go up now, for today...
There's one more thing I need you to do for me...
Have you ever heard of the autonomous city of Metus?
A coffee shop was recently opened in Metus...
They say there aren't enough young people...
Doesn't look like we have enough right now.
If you're ever in the neighborhood, that's fine.
Will you go and support me?
I'll go! I'll go!　I'm on it!
If there's anything else I can do, I'll ask you...
It's far away, so be careful when you go...
Mr. Arle, I have a part-time job...
It's just in time now... and I'll ask you again...
It's just in time now... and I'll ask you again...
It's a nice coffee shop. It's very relaxing.
Oh, by the way, I heard you're a traveler too?
That's quite a feat for such a young man.
There's been a lot of talk lately about the miasma forest, have you heard of it?
It's a forest in a land far away from here.
I've heard that travelers have been disappearing there a lot lately.
It's been an uneventful course of exploration until recently.
It seems that the miasma from the mysterious cave has caused a lot of trouble.
You know, if you're ever in the neighborhood...
Don't ever go near it, okay?
What?　Someone who seems to know a lot?
I don't know. It's too dangerous. It's like no one's coming near it anymore.
If there was a forest nymph, she could tell us more about it.
Damn it... I can't find anything at all.
What the hell kind of treasure is that...
I don't care if the waitress asks me.
Hey, I heard you also work here.
Here, I got something for you.
I tried my best to make it, but it's useless now.
At a place called Water Moon Lake.
I heard there's a wall that you just can't climb.
I just can't seem to find that wall.
Something to do with the right things.
I wonder if he happens to be free today.
There don't seem to be many visitors...
Maybe I should help you with something.
Yeah, when I say Tucool MV, I mean me.
I don't want to play that many games made by Tucool MV.
Have you ever heard of the ruins of Proyvida?
I guess it's not that major of a spot.
They say it's lying deep in the ground somewhere.
Lately, I've been noticing that I can get in through a certain forest.
But while it's good to know that we can enter the ruins.
I heard that an adventurer came running back covered in bandages.
He said he was almost mummified alive...
It's kind of funny, isn't it?
Maybe to a mummy monster or something.
I bet they made fun of you and kicked you out.
I'm going to try to get there now.
Well, you'll get in eventually... maybe.
What, the location of the forest?　That's easy.
I need you to rewrite the transference magic circle so that it looks like this.
If you're going to go, make sure you have enough time.
Inside the ruins, be careful not to become a mummy at best.
You look like a waitress to me...
From the looks of him, he's a mage in training...
Do you know a church deep in the Iwayama region?
I'm pretty sure there's a ranch there, and I've heard there's a lot of wildlife thieves.

It seems that there is a church standing in the middle of nowhere.

Thank you for taking the time to talk to me.

I thought I'd stop by here and see if they had any food.
But the Master is in trouble...
After you've had your coffee and your stomach has settled.
I'll try to find another place to eat.
But I only had one bowl of delicious curry to eat.
I feel like I'm getting a little something out of this.
Are you going to make me a better curry?
Well, I'll be in town a little while longer, so I'll be waiting in anticipation.
I've never had curry and rice this good!
Thank you. I'm all better now!
I've actually escaped from a forest.

I thought I'd head out to that forest one more time.
Of course, the bars don't have it, and neither does this coffee shop.

I enjoyed the curry the other day, but...
